Description: Limestone ostracon with remains of 11 ines of text on the recto and 5 lines on the verso containing a prayer.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably on the Excavation from 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (318-322, pl. 48)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82912) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82912)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 46 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
